[{"id":"BS-57","entityId":"2-1004","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BS"},{"name":"summary","value":"Smart spending sum insertion"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Vitalii Dmytruk"},{"name":"created","value":"1588603909093"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"57"},{"name":"description","value":"

Acceptance criteria

  • If total sum is inserted it is equally split among all "users"
  • If user doesn't have required amount of money, the maximum value is inserted. The missed part is equally split between others
  • if user amount is changed manually "smart insertion" is disabled

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1594740016541,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"BS-95","entityId":"2-1207","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BS"},{"name":"summary","value":"Win+FF: content changes width on navigation between users"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Vitalii Dmytruk"},{"name":"created","value":"1594738221733"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"95"},{"name":"description","value":"

Balance table and right side block changes their width. Content "jumps"

Steps to reproduce:

  1. click on Ievgen Bilonozhchenko record in balance table
  2. click on Galyna Goy record

Expected behavior: content width doesn't change
Actual behavior: width of left and right sides are changed.

As a user, I can select multiple users to see their total details of all user in my team
Acceptance criteria

  • It is possible to select multiple users
  • Selected users are highlighted
  • When multiple users are selected all their avatars are shown (as on mockup)
  • When multiple users are selected "User" as a first column is added to the record data

As a user, I can see the total details of all user in my team
Acceptance criteria

  • My Team Details button is shown near My Details button
  • My Team Details button is grayed in case team details are shown
  • When My Team Details are selected all team user avatars are shown (as on mockup)
  • When My Team Details are selected "User" as a first column is added to the record data
  • Members of the team are highlighted in the Balance table
  • URL contains user ids of all the users in the team

Acceptance criteria

  • each record in Balance table has "Team column"
  • Team short name is shown in the "Team column"
  • Click on the team name shows all users of the team in User Details (similar to MyTeamDetails) (enables multiuser mode)

[{"id":"LR-445","entityId":"2-1236","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Techdebt of LR-201: refactor UserService"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Nina Novoselska"},{"name":"created","value":"1596641575941"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"445"},{"name":"description","value":"

The idea is to move the creation of fake user from UserDetailsService to UserServiceBean.
Next step is to remove usage of isSecurityEnabled from MailServiceBean

Problem:
UserServiceBean has @RequestScope and it cannot be used in MailServiceBean because mailing is executed in separate thread, where request scope bean is not reachable

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Vitalii Dmytruk"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"vdmytruk"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"vdmytruk"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1600685863348"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"RD-2","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Stage","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":{"bg":"#8e1600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"State","value":["Submitted"],"valueId":["Submitted"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"vdmytruk","fullName":"Vitalii Dmytruk"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"O-14","entityId":"2-464","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"O"},{"name":"summary","value":"Batch-update roles on authorization service"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"created","value":"1574242201905"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"14"},{"name":"description","value":"

Currently each micro-service is responsible for roles registration and deletion logic.
It seems better to move all the roles management to authorization-service to keep roles management in single place.

As improvement we should:

  • add endpoint which will accept array of roles to register
  • authentication-service will decide which roles to delete/add based on incoming roles array.
  • update existing micro-services which already do roles registration and management
